function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in human activities and uses among space types as the main driver of microbial community structure","Impact":"Can lead to diverse microbial communities and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement zoning regulations for space use and activities to limit microbial diversity and transmission of contagious diseases","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Dispersal from outdoors as the important driver of indoor microbial community structure in smaller buildings with low occupant density","Impact":"Potential introduction of outdoor microbes and contaminants, increasing the risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enhance building envelope and ventilation systems to control outdoor air introduction and microbial dispersal","Technologies":"Airlocks, filtration systems, high-efficiency HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Design decisions influencing the ecology of microbes within a space type, such as the source of ventilation air","Impact":"Can lead to variations in bacterial community structure and abundance, impacting indoor air quality and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement standardized ventilation systems and air quality monitoring to control microbial community composition","Technologies":"Smart ventilation control systems, air quality sensors","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"}]}
